statements: DELETE FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE risk_score > 80 AND ETL_process = 'daily';
DELETE FROM risk_analysis WHERE analysis_name = 'Financial Risk Analysis';
DELETE FROM etl_processes WHERE status = 'failed' AND end_time < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM etl_processes WHERE process_name = 'Data Extraction' AND process_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM etl_processes WHERE process_id = 100 AND status = 'FAILED'
DELETE FROM industry_benchmarks WHERE industry_type = 'Technology' AND benchmark_value < 50
